_comment: Created by EFisher on 26/03/2014 16:41:59 using v2.1
title: Have the perceptions of the quality of care for community mental health services changed?
analysis_commentary: These data have been taken from annual surveys. The wording of the question used in the survey changed slightly in 2008 making it difficult to compare scores with previous years (please see the data notes for more details). Despite the lack of comparability with the data, the proportion of people feeling that their care was poor or very poor seems to have been consistently around 9% for all years and has been stable since 2010.
data_source: Care Quality Commission, Community Mental Health Survey
